body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.5 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Substantial JavaScript implementation.
Partial support for layered windows.
Support for Unicode file export in Regedit.
Proper exception handling in widl-generated code.
Asynchronous requests and cookies support in WinHTTP.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
